alert.note: Alert for Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 13 at 4:03AM MST until January 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Colorado, Uncompahgre Plateau and Dallas Divide. In Utah, La Sal and Abajo Mountains. * WHEN...From this evening through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops and mountain passes. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
